availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David C. Adams (Estill County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Sparks Adams in Estill County, Kentucky, on June 9, 1837. Father of Sarah A. Adams, Polly A. Adams, and Lucinda Adams. Married to Mary Ann Carmichael in Estill County on July 22, 1852. Father of Elizabeth F. Adams. Farmer in Estill County in 1850. Farmer in Estill County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 56A.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Estill County Marriages, Film #000254628, p. 107.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Estill County Marriages, Film #001760329, p. 1.
